name: Sit 'N Survive: Sister Location - MA
summary: Sister Location: MA is a troll game of Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location created by Scott Cawthon, claiming that Sister Location has a very dark story line and might not be suitable for children. Because of this, he said that he might work on the game for several more months to make the game and its story more appropriate for younger players. When the "mature" version was released, however, it turned out to be a hoax.
